skills.label: Create a presentation
items: Create blank presentations, create presentations using templates, import text files into presentations, import word document outlines into presentations

skills.label: Format a presentation using slide masters
items: Apply a slide master, add new layouts, modify existing layouts, add background images, control page numbers, insert headers and footers, modify presentation themes

skills.label: Customize presentation options and views
items: Change page setup options, change to view in color/grayscale, use views to navigate through presentations, modify presentation properties

skills.label: Configure presentations to print or save
items: Set handout print options, print selections from presentations, package presentations for cd, save presentations as webpages, print presentations in grayscale, print speaker notes, maintain backward compatibility

skills.label: Configure and present slideshows
items: Create custom slideshows, configure slideshow options, rehearse timing, configure slideshow resolution, use presenter view, navigate within slideshows, annotate slideshows

label: Insert and format shapes and slides

skills.label: Insert and format slides
items: Add slide layouts, duplicate existing slides, hide slides, delete slides, modify slide backgrounds, apply styles to slides

skills.label: Insert and format shapes
items: Modify shape backgrounds, apply borders to shapes, resize shapes, insert shapes, create custom shapes, apply styles to shapes

skills.label: Order and group shapes and slides
items: Insert section headers, modify slide order, align and group shapes, display gridlines

skills.label: Insert and format text
items: Change text to wordart, create multiple columns in a single shape, insert hyperlinks, apply formatting and styles to text, create bulleted and numbered lists

skills.label: Insert and format tables
items: Create new tables, modify number of rows and columns, apply table styles, import tables from external sources

skills.label: Insert and format charts
items: Create and modify chart styles, insert charts, modify chart type, add legends to charts, modify chart parameters, import charts from external sources

skills.label: Insert and format SmartArt
items: Add shapes to smartart, change color of smartart, move text within smartart shapes, reverse direction, convert lists to smartart

skills.label: Insert and format images
items: Resize images, crop images, apply effects, apply styles

skills.label: Insert and format media
items: Adjust media window size, trim timing on media clips, set start/stop times, set media options, link to external media

skills.label: Apply transitions between slides
items: Insert transitions between slides, manage multiple transitions, modify transition effect options

skills.label: Animate slide content
items: Apply animations to shapes, apply animations to text strings, add paths to animations, modify animation options

skills.label: Set timing for transitions and animations
items: Modify duration of effects, configure start and finish options, reorder animations, use the animation pane

skills.label: Merge content from multiple presentations
items: Merge multiple presentations, reuse slides from other presentations, view multiple presentations

skills.label: Track changes and resolve differences
items: Set track changes, modify options for track changes, discard changes from specific users, manage comments

skills.label: Protect and share presentations
items: Encrypt presentations with a password, proof presentations, mark as final, compress media, embed fonts, restrict permissions, remove presentation metadata, check for accessibility issues, check for compatibility issues
